mapper.sql: stud_id, rentDesc, admin_id, signtime, sealer, sealtime
stud_id,stu_depart.departname as departname,major,sclass,grade,education,studname, studsex,studphone1,studphone2,adress,familyphone,rentDesc, admin_id, signtime, sealer, sealtime
mapper.select:
select
from educandcomp LEFT JOIN admin on admin.adminid = educandcomp.admin_id LEFT JOIN admin as sealer on sealer.adminid = educandcomp.sealer LEFT JOIN (SELECT studid,departname,major,sclass,grade,education,studname,studsex,studphone1,studphone2,adress,familyphone FROM students left join department ON students.departId = department.departid) as stu_depart on stu_depart.studid = educandcomp.stud_id
mapper.insert:
insert into educandcomp
stud_id,
rentDesc,
admin_id,
signtime,
sealer,
sealtime,
#{studId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rentdesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{adminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{signtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{sealer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sealtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update educandcomp
rentDesc = #{rentdesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
signtime = #{signtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
sealer = #{sealer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sealtime = #{sealtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where stud_id = #{studId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update educandcomp set rentDesc = #{rentdesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, signtime = #{signtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sealer = #{sealer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sealtime = #{sealtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where stud_id = #{studId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
